items.sentence: Tom is very honest, so I'm sure that we can rely on him.
I don't think we should start second-guessing ourselves.
It took us a long time to figure out where Tom had gone.
Swimmers are supposed to wear bathing caps in this pool.
The girl riding on the back of Tom's motorcycle is Mary.
Tom isn't Mary's stepfather. He's her biological father.
I want to try to learn three languages at the same time.
Tom has had a beard since he graduated from high school.
I thought that I told you not to buy any more junk food.
I'm glad I didn't do everything that Tom asked me to do.
I'm glad that I didn't do everything Tom asked me to do.
There's a possibility that the delay will frustrate Tom.
My friends and I are planning to go skiing next weekend.
I always confuse which side is port and which starboard.
I asked the butcher to trim all the fat off of the meat.
I want to live in a world where people love one another.
I have no interest in putting my money into your dreams.
We were all surprised at the effect the news had on Tom.
We just missed the last bus, so we'll have to walk home.
Tom works in a factory and my other son works in a bank.
